__e: You know, from what I hear, there are plenty of nut cases running around star city, looking to make it a better place.

What happened to you in Star City, that was my fault, and I can't allow anything like that to happen ever again, and that's why I've asked your mother to move you far away and to not tell anyone where she's taking you,
He has a face, he has a name, and I think that it is high time the people of Star City know the truth about who he is.
